data.meta_description: "Love Affair" movie still, 1994.  L to R: Annette Bening, co-writer/producer/star Warren Beatty.  PLOT: A singer (Bening) and ex-football star (Beatty) meet on a ship, fall in love, and agree to meet three months later.  On her way to the meeting, she gets into an accident and he doesn't know it.  Based on the 1939 movie of the same name, this was the third time it was remade.  The other was the 1957 Cary Grant-Deborah Kerr film "An Affair to Remember".
